text.We offer the most trusted BitTorrent Mac: We offer the most trusted BitTorrent Mac torrent clients. Download our easy-to-use web torrent client that supports macOS Catalina and below, or our bulk torrent desktop app if you’re running macOS Mojave 10.14 and below.
text.Now available for macOS Catalina, BitTor: Now available for macOS Catalina, BitTorrent Web for Mac is a simplified torrent client that installs directly into your favorite browser. Download any file type to store locally in the folder of your choice and play torrent files while they download without needing to search folders or look for other media player apps.
text.Available for MacOS Mojave 10.14 and bel: Available for MacOS Mojave 10.14 and below, BitTorrent Classic for Mac is the original Mac torrent downloader for experienced users. Ideal for fast, bulk downloading from the desktop, this BitTorrent desktop app includes advanced customization options for those running older macOS versions.
text.Not compatible with MAC OS Catalina Vers: Not compatible with MAC OS Catalina Version 10.15 and above

navText.If you have any questions, please contac: If you have any questions, please contact Simplex customer support at support@simplex.com.
